DOC.HEADLINE: FINAL ORANGE COUNTY ELECTION RETURNS
DOC.TEXT: Key to Election Tables -- An asterisk ( * ) denotes an incumbent candidate ; a double asterisk ( * * ) denotes an appointed incumbent . -- Elected candidates and approved measures -- or those leading with 99 % of precincts reporting -- are in bold type .
